resources.string: It seems like you\'re using this app for the first time. Please, do read the about (Menu > About), as you need to do some configurations by your own.
Swipe left/right > Remove\nPress once > Edit\nHold+Drag > Reorder
No sticker found\nMenu > Add to add sticker

ABOUT
This app provide an easy way to paste the URLs of LINE\'s sticker into Discord, which is inspired by BetterDiscord Line Stickers Plugin. This app isn\'t a plugin unfortunately, but a standalone app and therefore doesn\'t require BetterDiscord.

USAGE
You need to find out the required IDs before using those stickers, which might be a little bit tricky for some inexperienced users. Don\'t worry, tutorial can be found on GitHub page. The workflow is almost the same with the BD Plugin counterpart by the way.

ATTRIBUTION
Icon made by Baianat from www.flaticon.com

DISCLAIMER
This app is not affiliated with, maintained, authorized, endorsed or sponsored by the LINE Corporation, Discord Inc. or any of their affiliates. Downloaded content is for display purpose only. Nothing is re-uploaded. We take no resposibility or liability for using this app.
